Uses of Class
com.basho.riak.client.query.indexes.RiakIndex

  • Packages that use RiakIndex 
    Package Description
    com.basho.riak.client.bucket
    A bucket is a namespace abstraction provided by Riak, the API uses Bucket as the primary way to interact with data stored in Riak.
    com.basho.riak.client.query.indexes
